title: Cross-Check Pallet at Loading Dock
description: To prevent loading errors, a final check is performed by scanning a pallet's license plate at the dock door to ensure it belongs on the truck being loaded.

tasks.description: A loader scans the dock door barcode to set their context to the current shipment being loaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scanner is now locked to a specific manifest.

tasks.description: The loader brings a pallet from staging and scans its license plate.
The system validates if the scanned pallet belongs to the manifest for that dock door. It returns a 'Success' message.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the pallet is correct, and the loader proceeds to load it.

tasks.description: The loader scans another pallet, but the system returns an 'Error: Pallet Belongs to Different Shipment' message, preventing a loading error.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system successfully prevents an incorrect pallet from being loaded.
